document.full_text: gunmen on rooftops shot dead up to 42 protesters at an anti-government rally in sanaa after muslim prayers on friday, enraging the opposition and prompting president ali abdullah saleh to declare a state of emergency.
document.title: yemen in state of emergency after protest massacre
lines_and_colors: gunmen on rooftops shot dead up to 42 protesters at an anti-government rally in sanaa after muslim prayers on friday, enraging the opposition and prompting president ali abdullah saleh to declare a state of emergency.
